content: During the course of today's call, management will be making forward-looking statements including statements regarding projections for future operating results, including potential revenue growth, industry and customer trends, capital allocation strategy, supply chain constraints, expectations, company's positioning and repurchase and dividend programs along with its market share. In the fourth quarter, our operating expenses increased 7.7%, compared to prior year and for the full-year our operating expenses increased by $13.2 million or 9.1%, against a 12.1% revenue growth. Fourth quarter revenue was a record $77.6 million, up 9.9% year-over-year. Product revenue for the quarter was $49.6 million, representing  (ph) of total revenue, up 13.5% year-over-year. We reported $19.8 million in non-GAAP operating income, a record result, up 13%, compared with $17.6 million in the year ago quarter. Adjusted EBITDA was $22.3 million for the quarter, also a record reflecting 28.7% of revenue. On a GAAP basis, net income for the quarter was $18 million or $0.24 per share, compared with net income of $10.7 million or $0.13 per share in the year ago quarter. Revenue was a record $280.3 million, up 12.1% year-over-year. Product revenue for the year was $173.2 million, representing 61.8% of total revenue. Non-GAAP net income for the year was $57.7 million or $0.74 on a per share basis, compared to net income of $50.1 million or $0.63 per share last year. On a GAAP basis, net income for the year was $46.9 million or $0.60 per share, compared with net income of $94.9 million or $1.19 per share last year.
